import { Component, Input, inject } from '@angular/core'; import { Task, Todo } from '../models'; import { FormBuilder, FormGroup } from '@angular/forms'; @Component({ selector: 'app-todolist', templateUrl: './todolist.component.html', styleUrls: ['./todolist.component.css'] }) export class TodolistComponent { @Input() todos: Todo[] = [] fb: FormBuilder = inject(FormBuilder) submitForm() { const todo: Todo = this.todoForm.value todo.tasks.push(this.tasksSelected) } removeTask(i: number) { this.tasksSelected.removeAt(i) } }
Task Priority Due Date
